name: The Creation of Agony
description:
"What? Is man merely a mistake of God's? Or God merely a mistake of man's?"

This gif is a rework from my digital collage for a book cover back on 2019, titled “Psychoanalysis and Religion” (1950) by Erich Fromm. Inspired by quotes from "Twilight of the Idols" (1888) by Friedrich Nietzsche and hand gestures from "The Creation of Adam" (1512) by Michelangelo.

Created on Procreate, 2022
